title: The complete chronicles of Thomas Covenant
description:
The entire series of 'The Chronicles of Thomas Covenant' in audiobook format, written by Stephen R. Donaldson.

This series of ten high fantasy novels was written from 1977 through 2014, and is rather unconventional for the genre (protagonist is a leper for example).
All files are .mp3 format.


-First Chronicles-

Lord Foul's Bane (read by John Chancer)

The Illearth War (read by John Chancer)

The Power That Preserves (read by John Chancer)


-Second Chronicles-

The Wounded Land (read by John Chancer)

The One Tree (read by John Chancer)

White Gold Wielder (read by John Chancer)


-Last Chronicles-

Runes of the Earth (read by Scott Brick)

Fatal Revenant (read by Scott Brick)

Against All Things Ending (read by Tim Gerard Reynolds)

The Last Dark (read by Scott Brick)


Note - I did not encode these myself, just compiled the best audio from each torrent available and cleaned up the file structure. Enjoy!
